<implements name="Structure" />
* This interface represents a structure with a binary additive * operation (+), satisfying the group axioms (associativity, neutral element, * inverse element and closure). Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.0, February 13, 2006
* Wikipedia: Mathematical Group
* Returns the sum of this object with the one specified. that the object to be added. this + that.
* Returns the additive inverse of this object. It is the object such as * this.plus(this.opposite()) == ZERO, * with ZERO being the additive identity. -this.
